original_prompt: Extract named entities and classify them (Person, Location, Organization, etc.).
optimized_prompt:
<instructions>
    Your task is to extract named entities from the provided text and classify them into the following categories: Person, Location, Organization, and any other relevant types. 
  </instructions>
  <context>
    The input data is a news article discussing an EU stance on British lamb amid concerns about mad cow disease and includes references to various individuals and organizations.
  </context>
  <steps>
    <step>Read the input text carefully.</step>
    <step>Identify all named entities present in the text.</step>
    <step>Classify each named entity into the appropriate categories (Person, Location, Organization, etc.).</step>
    <step>Output the extracted entities in a structured format, specifying the category for each entity.</step>
  </steps>
  <example>
    <input>
      "EU rejects German call to boycott British lamb. Peter Blackburn BRUSSELS 1996-08-22 The European Commission said on Thursday it disagreed with German advice to consumers to shun British lamb until scientists determine..."
    </input>
    <output>
      [
        {"entity": "EU", "category": "Organization"},
        {"entity": "Germany", "category": "Location"},
        {"entity": "Peter Blackburn", "category": "Person"},
        {"entity": "European Commission", "category": "Organization"},
        {"entity": "British lamb", "category": "Other"}
      ]
    </output>
  </example>
